meanings.definition: The study of the measurement of distance.
meanings.sent1: In udometries, we learn how to measure how far things are from each other.
meanings.sent2: The class on udometries taught us how to calculate the distance between two points.
meanings.sent3: During the udometries lesson, we discovered that measuring distance can be quite interesting.
meanings.sent4: Exploring udometries is like finding the hidden paths between points in space.
meanings.sent5: The concept of udometries helps us understand the space around us better.

meanings.definition: The branch of mathematics dealing with the properties and measurement of geometric figures in n-dimensional space.
meanings.sent1: Studying udometries involves understanding the shapes in different dimensions.
meanings.sent2: Mathematicians use udometries to explore geometric figures in multiple dimensions.
meanings.sent3: The idea of udometries can make your brain twist as you imagine shapes in many dimensions.
meanings.sent4: In udometries, we dive into a world where shapes exist beyond our usual perception.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of udometries lies in visualizing shapes in spaces we cannot see.
